alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Brown; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 11:26PM CDT until June 28 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN ROCK...NORTHEASTERN BROWN...EASTERN KEYA PAHA AND SOUTHWESTERN BOYD COUNTIES... At 1126 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles west of Naper to 14 miles northwest of Newport to 8 miles north of Bassett, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Burton, Nets Peak, Thomas Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Mariaville, Mills, Brocksburg and Keller Park State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 203 and 209, and near mile marker 128. Highway 12 between mile markers 57 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
